name: Hunter Glory
description:
Discord: https://discord.gg/kvfcyrz

[Game Introduction]

Welcome to Hunter’s world! An epic anime RPG game based on the mega-hit manga. Featuring classic turn-based RPG battle mechanics mixed with an intuitive auto-battle system, players will be able to relive the adventures from the original manga.

The story will begin with Whale Island, where players follow Gon and Killua to embark on a wonderful hunter growth journey. Are you ready to collect and battle with all your favorite characters? Join now and enjoy an authentic fantasy otaku experience whenever and wherever you want, right in the palm of your hand. 

[Game Features]

- Relive the original anime storyline
Amazingly, the exquisite graphics and simple controls based on the style and scene of the original comics make for free-flowing and fast-paced hack-and-slash battle. The unpredictable and diverse world is now yours to explore!

- Collect an array of legendary Hunters and cards
With over 70 characters and hundreds of cards, players will not only summon exclusive hunters but also be able to collect cards and equip them to be used for various abilities. A highly flexible character improvement system that allows you to create exactly the hunters and the team you want.

- Simple RPG battle gameplay, strategic line-up!
Experience the intuitive RPG auto-battle system and unleash each Hunter's unique special moves to carve your way to victory. Use special combo skills with certain characters for even more damage! You can even make combinations of characters you would never see in the original story. The possibilities are almost limitless! 

- Diverse dungeons and boss waiting for you to challenge
Swindlers Swamp, Greedy Island, Ant’s Cavern…, in addition to experiencing the wonderful story, players have to clear boss with unknown abilities. Learning to correctly assess the overall strength of the boss is also the key to winning the dungeons adventure!

- Unite and fight together with your friends or guild members
Forge alliances with other players and take on an array of dangerous opponents together! Assemble a robust team of hunters and go to battle in Dark Continent and Guild War. Guild bosses and dungeons are more challenging than ever.
